shortdesc.ph: Starts the last-mile network probe test.
Starts the last-mile network probe test.

section.p:
Call sequence: Do not call other methods before receiving the and callbacks, or these callbacks may be interrupted. Related callbacks: After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the following two callbacks in sequence:
: Triggered within about two seconds based on network conditions. This callback evaluates network quality and is closer to user experience.
: Triggered within about 30 seconds based on network conditions. This callback returns real-time statistics of the network condition, providing a more objective view.
This method starts the last-mile network probe test before joining a channel to obtain uplink and downlink network statistics, including bandwidth, packet loss, jitter, and round-trip time (RTT).
